data.name: Nuwe: First seeds
data.detailed_description:
Throughout this adventure you will discover amazing places and fascinating creatures.
Our character will have to overcome platforms and puzzles to get the vital essence of the fauna and vegetation of planets that are close to be destroyed.
The artistic design, the fluidity of the animations and its innovative display system that alternates 2D and 3D are some of the features that will make you enjoy this special journey.

Our universe is being devastated.
The only way to save it is moving all life essence to Nuwe. The eternal planet.
You were born for this.
Jump into the darkness to find light.
Connecting with all life form to keep it safe.
A chance to start over.

data.short_description: Adventure game with a spectacular design and innovative 2D, 3D platform mechanics. Located in a beautiful universe full of incredible creatures and landscapes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Ryzen 2000
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 4000
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTZ 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
